Article.Title: Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law

Content.Condition: Any judgment of a court or tribunal and any decision of an administrative authority of a third country requiring a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data

Requirement.Basis: May only be recognised or enforceable in any manner
Requirement.Condition: If based on an international agreement
Requirement.Status: In force between the requesting third country and the Union or a Member State

Content.Note: Without prejudice to other grounds for transfer pursuant to this Chapter
